title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11 ยง 27.18 - Return premiums
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11 ยง 27.18 - Return premiums

State Regulations

In the event of cancellation of an insurance policy placed by an excess line broker with an unauthorized insurer, the excess line broker shall apply best efforts to collect for the insured all unearned premiums due. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 11
ยง
27.18

Amended, New

York State Register October 8, 2014/Volume XXXVI, Issue 40, eff. 10/8/2014

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
